1. Recap tidyr
2. Clean the who data (https://www.who.int/tb/country/data/download/en/)
3. Non-vectorised conditionals (if else if else, any, all)
4. Vectorised conditionals (if_else, case_when)


```{r}
library(tidyverse); library(nycflights13)


x <- c(6, 5)

if(x == 5)  {
    "YAY"
} else {
    "NAY"
}

who
```

```{r}
x <- 1:20
case_when(
    x %in% seq(2, 20, by = 2) ~ "even",
    x %in% seq(0, 20, by = 3) ~ "three",
    TRUE ~ "all other"
)
```


```{r}
x <- sample(c(1:20, NA), size = 10, replace = T)

any(is.na(x))
```
